messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: women and fittings
messages.msgSnippet: BTW, founder Jochiku s daughters Jotetsu and Josui made fittings in the Murakami group. Jim ... Not on April 1st :-)  Now over, let s get back to real Nihonto.
messages.messageBody:
BTW, founder Jochiku's daughters Jotetsu and Josui made fittings in the Murakami group.

Jim

wrote:
> I thought this study group was supposed to be serious? Mark. :-)

Not on April 1st :-) Now over, let's get back to real Nihonto.

Rich S
